Reward.Name: Battle Scar
Reward.Description: [H3]Battle Scar[h3] Please see page 95 of the Forged in Battle Sourcebook for details.

Option.Name: Easy Severity
Option.Description: Battle Scar received for an Easy-Severity Critical Injury

Option.Name: Average Severity
Option.Description: Battle Scar received for an Average-Severity Critical Injury

Option.Name: Hard Severity
Option.Description: Battle Scar received for a Hard-Severity Critical Injury

Option.Name: Daunting Severity
Option.Description: Battle Scar received for a Daunting-Severity Critical Injury

Option.Name: Commanding Presence
Option.Description: Receiving the Commanding Presence talent

Option.Name: Confidence
Option.Description: Receiving the Confidence talent

Option.Name: Intimidating
Option.Description: Receiving the Intimidating talent

Option.Name: Steely Nerves
Option.Description: Receiving the Steely Nerves talent

Option.Name: Street Smarts
Option.Description: Receiving the Street Smarts talent

Option.Name: Grit
Option.Description: Receiving the Grit talent

Option.Name: Hard Headed
Option.Description: Receiving the Hard Headed talent

Option.Name: Heightened Awareness
Option.Description: Receiving the Heightened Awareness talent

Option.Name: Resolve
Option.Description: Receiving the Resolve talent

Option.Name: Sixth Sense
Option.Description: Receiving the Sixth Sense talent

Option.Name: Blooded
Option.Description: Receiving the Blooded talent

Option.Name: Durable
Option.Description: Receiving the Durable talent

Option.Name: Rapid Recovery
Option.Description: Receiving the Rapid Recovery talent

Option.Name: Second Wind
Option.Description: Receiving the Second Wind talent

Option.Name: Toughened
Option.Description: Receiving the Toughened talent

Option.Name: Defensive Stance
Option.Description: Receiving the Defensive Stance talent

Option.Name: Dodge
Option.Description: Receiving the Dodge talent

Option.Name: Jump Up
Option.Description: Receiving the Jump Up talent

Option.Name: Rapid Reaction
Option.Description: Receiving the Rapid Reaction talent

Option.Name: Spare Clip
Option.Description: Receiving the Spare Clip talent

Option.Name: Time To Go
Option.Description: Receiving the Time To Go talent

Reward.Name: Maker's Mark
Reward.Description: [H3]Maker's Mark[h3] Please see page 95 of the Fully Operational Sourcebook for details.

Option.Name: Reduced Cost of Crafting Improvement
Option.Description: May reduce cost of selected crafting improvement by [AD] for all future crafting checks.

Reward.Name: Proven Expertise
Reward.Description: [H3]Proven Expertise[h3] Please see page 95 of the Fully Operational Sourcebook for details.

Option.Name: Expertise in a Field
Option.Description: May spend [AD][AD] as [SU] on skill checks relevant to the area of expertise.

Reward.Name: Reputation
Reward.Description: [H3]Reputation[h3] Please see page 92 of the Keeping the Peace Sourcebook, or page 95 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook, for details.

Option.Name: Level 3: Beloved
Option.Description: Add [BO][BO][BO] to Charm and Negotiation checks. Add [SE][SE][SE] to Coercion checks. May spend Destiny Point to find a person or place in need of defense.

Option.Name: Level 2: Renowned
Option.Description: Add [BO][BO] to Charm and Negotiation checks. Add [SE][SE] to Coercion checks. May spend Destiny Point to find where PC is most needed.

Option.Name: Level 1: Respected
Option.Description: Add [BO] to Charm and Negotiation checks. Add [SE] to Coercion checks.

Option.Name: Level 0: Neutral
Option.Description: Add [BO] or [SE] based upon individual interactions.

Option.Name: Level -1: Feared
Option.Description: Add [BO] to Coercion checks. Add [SE] to Charm and Negotiation checks.

Option.Name: Level -2: Notorious
Option.Description: Add [BO][BO] to Coercion checks. Add [SE][SE] to Charm and Negotiation checks. May spend Destiny Point to have individual overlook one of PC's misdeeds.

Option.Name: Level -3: Dreaded
Option.Description: Add [BO][BO][BO] to Coercion checks. Add [SE][SE][SE] to Charm and Negotiation checks. May spend Destiny Point to have individual overlook one of PC's misdeeds, or have minion group flee in terror.

Reward.Name: Ally
Reward.Description: [H3]Ally[h3] Please see page 94 of the Knights of Fate Sourcebook for details.

Option.Name: Grateful Ally
Option.Description: Once per session, ally may make one Knowledge, Skulduggery, or Streetwise check with [AB][AB][AB].

Option.Name: Indebted Ally
Option.Description: Once per session, ally may make one Knowledge, Skulduggery, or Streetwise check with [AB][AB][PR].

Option.Name: Loyal Ally
Option.Description: Once per session, ally may make one Knowledge, Skulduggery, or Streetwise check with [AB][AB][PR][PR].

Reward.Name: Apprentice
Reward.Description: [H3]Apprentice[h3] Please see page 94 of the Knights of Fate Sourcebook for details.

Option.Name: Novice Apprentice
Option.Description: Add [BO] to all combat checks.

Option.Name: Trained Apprentice
Option.Description: Add automatic [AD] to all combat checks, or add +1 melee defense (PC's choice at start of turn).

Option.Name: Experienced Apprentice
Option.Description: Add automatic [SU][AD] to all combat checks, or add +2 melee defense (PC's choice at start of turn).

Reward.Name: Follower
Reward.Description: [H3]Follower[h3] Please see page 95 of the Knights of Fate Sourcebook for details.

Option.Name: Helpful Follower
Option.Description: Makes one Computers, Mechanics, or Medicine check with [AB][AB][AB].

Option.Name: Loyal Follower
Option.Description: Makes one Computers, Mechanics, or Medicine check with [AB][AB][PR].

Option.Name: Trusted Follower
Option.Description: Makes one Computers, Mechanics, or Medicine check with [AB][AB][PR][PR].

Reward.Name: School
Reward.Description: [H3]School[h3] Please see page 95 of the Knights of Fate Sourcebook for details.

Option.Name: Local Gym
Option.Description: Add [BO] to follower and ally checks, and to checks aided by an apprentice.

Option.Name: Respected Dojo
Option.Description: Add [BO][BO] to follower and ally checks, and [AD] to checks aided by an apprentice.

Option.Name: Training Academy
Option.Description: Upgrade ability of follower and ally checks, and add [AD][SU] to checks aided by an apprentice.

Reward.Name: Medal of Honor
Reward.Description: [H3]Medal of Honor[h3] Please see page 92 of the Lead by Example Sourcebook for details.

Option.Name: Corellian Cross
Option.Description: You are the recipient of the Corellian Cross for gallantry in the field.

Option.Name: Illudium Star
Option.Description: You are the recipient of the Illudium Star for actions above and beyond the call of duty.

Option.Name: Kalidor Crescent
Option.Description: You are the recipient of the Kalidor Crescent for conspicuous and intrepid gallantry at the risk of life above and byond the call of duty.

Option.Name: Mantooine Medallion
Option.Description: You are the recipient of the Mantooine Medallion for exhibiting exceptional bravery in the face of an enemy force.

Option.Name: Star of Alderaan
Option.Description: You are the recipient of the Star of Alderaan for acts of conspicuous bravery during combat operations.

Reward.Name: Campaign Medal/Ribbon
Reward.Description: [H3]Campaign Medal or Ribbon[h3] Please see page 95 of the Lead by Example Sourcebook for details.

Option.Name: Battle of Endor
Option.Description: You have earned the Battle of Endor campaign ribbon for participating in the Battle of Endor.

Option.Name: Death Star
Option.Description: You have earned the Death Star campaign medal for flying against the Death Star in the Battle of Yavin.

Option.Name: Death Star II
Option.Description: You have earned the Death Star II campaign medal flying against Imperial Forces in the Battle of Endor.

Option.Name: Defense of Hoth
Option.Description: You have earned the Defense of Hoth campaign medal by being assigned to Echo Base during the evacuation of Hoth.

Option.Name: Defense of Yavin
Option.Description: You have earned the Defense of Yavin campaign medal for being present at the Battle of Yavin.

Reward.Name: Military/Civilian Decoration
Reward.Description: [H3]Military or Civilian Decoration[h3] Please see page 95 of the Lead by Example Sourcebook for details.

Option.Name: Redbird Badge
Option.Description: You have earned the Redbird badge for being wounded in the line of duty.

Option.Name: Distinguished Flying Medal
Option.Description: You have earned the Distinguished Flying Medal.

Option.Name: Aviator's Wings
Option.Description: You have earned your Aviator's Wings as a pilot with the Alliance.

Option.Name: Infantryman's Badge
Option.Description: You have earned the Infantryman's Badge for completing your first combat mission.

Reward.Name: Honored Title
Reward.Description: [H3]Honored Title[h3] Please see page 92 of the Knights of Fate Sourcebook for details.

Option.Name: Classroom Title
Option.Description: Received for formalized study of a martial art.[BR][B]Applicable Social Skills[b]:Coercion, Negotiation

Option.Name: Championship Title
Option.Description: Received for winning a competition.[BR][B]Applicable Social Skills[b]: Charm, Deception

Option.Name: Legendary Title
Option.Description: Received for combat experience.[BR][B]Applicable Social Skills[b]: Coercion, Leadership

Option.Name: Minor Title
Option.Description: Once per encounter, add [BO][BO] to the next applicable social skill check.

Option.Name: Moderate Title
Option.Description: Once per encounter, upgrade ability of the next applicable social skill check.

Option.Name: Major Title
Option.Description: Once per encounter, add [SU][SU] to the next applicable social skill check.
